text: minisunva (tṛptiyaṭa pat kirīmaṭa) avaśya udāharaṇayan siyalla mema kurānayayehi niyata vaśayenma api pavasā ættemu. (meya bāra nogat ovun kæmati vana) kumana sādhakayak oba ovun veta gena giyā vuvada, (nabiyē!) “obat (obaṭa lædi ayat) borukārayinma misa, vena kisiveku nova” yayi mema pratikṣēpa karannan pavasannāha
